name: 10 SECOND ASCENCION
description:
Part of my AUT year 3 course work: A Game per Week #1/8

Very rough prototype that contains the basic mechanics and one level. 

This game is designed to be operated with two controllers. The prototype will select the first two controllers plugged into the system. If using DS4 windows please set up ds4w before playing, and make sure you're using exclusive mode.

CONTROLS:

InputXBOX 360
Dualshock 4
Keyboard (P1)
Keyboard (P2)MoveLeft Stick
Left StickA/DLeft/Right arrows
JumpAX (Square if not using DS4W)
WUp arrow
InteractXSquare (Circle if not using DS4W)
SDown arrow
